bach_open_taxonomy.ModelHub.filter¶

property ModelHub.filter¶

Access filter methods from the model hub. Same as f().

class Filter(df)

Methods in this class can be used as filters in aggregation models. Always return SeriesBoolean with same base node as the ObjectivFrame the method is applied to.

Filter.conversion(name)

Labels a hit True if it is a conversion hit.

Parameters

name – the name of the conversion to label as set in bach_open_taxonomy.ObjectivFrame.conversion_events.

Returns

SeriesBoolean with same base node as the ObjectivFrame this method is applied to.

Filter.is_first_session()

Labels a session True if the session is the first session of that user in the data.

Returns

SeriesBoolean with same base node as the ObjectivFrame this method is applied to.
